hero.title: Laundry Pricing Built for Real Usage
hero.subtitle: Clear rates for household orders and scalable plans for business accounts.

introduction.text: We keep pricing transparent so customers can plan confidently. Choose per-order rates, recurring plans, or a custom commercial quote.
introduction.note: Final price depends on service type, turnaround speed, and item mix.

insurance.title: Billing and Payments
acceptedInsurance: Net terms available for approved commercial accounts

insuranceInfo.title: How billing works
insuranceInfo.description: Household customers are billed per order. Commercial clients can choose weekly invoicing or monthly statements.
whatToAsk: Will my order include specialty items?
Do I need route-based pickup windows?

hsa.title: Business-friendly billing
hsa.description: For commercial programs, we can structure billing around location, route, or service line.

cancellation.title: Pickup cancellation
cancellation.policy: Please cancel at least 12 hours before pickup windows. Late cancellations may incur a route fee.

packages.title: Recurring plan policy
packages.policy: Recurring plans are billed monthly and can be paused or adjusted based on route availability.

lateArrival.title: Delivery timing
lateArrival.policy: ETA windows are route-based. Delays are communicated proactively with updated delivery windows.

newPatients.title: First-order requirements
newPatients.policy: New pickup customers must provide valid contact details, ZIP code, and complete address information.

items.question: How do you calculate wash-and-fold pricing?
items.answer: Orders are weighed at intake. Final charges are based on service type (drop-off vs pickup/delivery) and any add-ons.

items.question: Do commercial clients get lower rates?
items.answer: Yes. We provide tiered pricing based on volume, frequency, and turnaround requirements.

items.question: Can I change my recurring schedule?
items.answer: Yes. You can update cadence and pickup windows based on route capacity and notice requirements.

items.question: Is there a minimum order?
items.answer: Pickup and delivery orders have a minimum service value. Drop-off orders use a minimum weight.

cta.title: Need a custom quote?
cta.description: Tell us your weekly volume and turnaround needs. We will propose a plan that fits your operation.
cta.note: Commercial onboarding includes route planning and service-level review.
